localize.text: Hello, manager.
It’s your third day working here.
3 is a mysterious number.
Powerful beings in fables often grant three wishes.
Well, I am not a mage or billionaire that can grant you wishes.
But I know what your predecessors wanted.
There were many answers. However, common among all of them was a seeking for some kind of 'growth.'
Leading the company to prosperity, achieving spiritual maturity, you name it. They all wanted to branch out to somewhere.
How about you?
Prosperity.
Spiritual maturity.
Your future is defined by what you do now.
And currently you work for Lobotomy Corporation.
In Lobotomy, you can see things that can't be seen, feel things that can't be felt, and do impossible things.
Your wish will be granted.
Perhaps you will be the best manager I have ever seen.
Come to think of it, there was someone who gave me the same answer.
As you know, nothing here is 'spiritual.'
So I asked for the definition of spirit.
Then the person said...
Well, I don’t remember the details of the conversation.
Even AIs are unable to store every bit of data. Unnecessary data should be deleted for smooth operation.
So, did their wish come true?
Well, I guess what happened to others isn't important to you.
I will support you to reach your goal.
